publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8149 Jackie Baillie: Route 81 Youth Project—That the Parliament congratulates the Route 81 Youth Project on opening Centre 81, a new community centre in Garelochhead; further congratulates the group on the active involvement of young people in the decision and planning process of developing the project; welcomes it as an inspiring example of a grassroots effort providing important amenities to the local community; acknowledges the contributions of the Big Lottery Fund, Scotland Rural Development Programme, Communities Scotland, Church of Scotland Development Fund, Climate Challenge Fund, Tudor Trust and CARES, and considers that the new centre will play a significant role in serving the needs of young people in Garelochhead and Portincaple. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-8149 Jackie Baillie: Route 81 Youth Project—That the Parliament congratulates the Route 81 Youth Project on opening Centre 81, a new community centre in Garelochhead; further congratulates the group on the active involvement of young people in the decision and planning process of developing the project; welcomes it as an inspiring example of a grassroots effort providing important amenities to the local community; acknowledges the contributions of the Big Lottery Fund, Scotland Rural Development Programme, Communities Scotland, Church of Scotland Development Fund, Climate Challenge Fund, Tudor Trust and CARES, and considers that the new centre will play a significant role in serving the needs of young people in Garelochhead and Portincaple. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
